newsitem.title: USA: NASD expels, fines Orlando, Fla., muni bond firm.
newsitem.headline: NASD expels, fines Orlando, Fla., muni bond firm.

text.p: National Association of Securities Dealers said Thursday it fined an Orlando, Fla., securities firm and one of its officials a total of $116,586 for underwriting municipal bonds without first registering with NASD as a broker/dealer.

NASD fined Willie Daniels of Brooklyn, N.Y., and his firm United Daniels Securities Inc of Orlando $50,000 and ordered them to relinquish $66,586 in profits, NASD said in its monthly announcement of disciplinary actions.
NASD also expelled the firm from membership with the association and barred Daniels from associating with any NASD member in any capacity.
Daniels and his firm agreed to the penalties without admitting or denying the charges, NASD said.
Neither the firm nor Daniels could be reached for comment.
